column4: i have set up a wireless network using wep. when i connect to my AP everything seems fine, except i dont seem to have internet?
good luck with that, i gave up on trying to get wep/wap working
no, i just go with mac filtr
ok that sounds helpful, this would provide adequate security?
no, mac filter is not very good security since it can be cracked pretty quick.  but i'm not worried about it where i live
great, so there is no hope for a properly secure wireless netowrk in linux??
yeah it's possible, i just can't figure it out.  NM is so weird.  i set all my stuff in /etc/network/interfaces, then network manager just erases it
is there some way to remove nm??
yeah, you can remove anything you want, remove network-manager and network-manager-gnome and install wicd, see if you have better results than i did
it seems to connect but hwen i open firefox i cant load any pages
almost seems like a dns problem
ping an ip, then ping an address, if you can ping an ip but not an address then yeah it's a dns problem
